text: LEASE AGREEMENT (for agriculture lands) This Lease Agreement is made and executed on this 28th day of October, 2025 at Nalgonda District, Telangana, by and between: Sri RAMESH REDDY, S/o LATE VENKATA REDDY, aged about 54 years, Occupation: Agriculture, R/o H.No. 2-45, Main Road, Ramapur Village, Nalgonda Mandal, Nalgonda District, Telangana. (Hereinafter called the Landlord or LESSOR which term shall mean and include all his heirs, legal representatives, nominees and assigns etc.). AND Sri NAGARAJU YADAV, S/o KRISHNA YADAV, aged about 38 years, Occupation: Cultivation, R/o H.No. 4-89, Lakshmipur Village, Nalgonda Mandal, Nalgonda District, Telangana. (Hereinafter called the LESSEE which term shall mean and include all his heirs, legal representatives, nominees and assignees etc.). Whereas the landlord herein is the absolute owner of the agriculture land bearing Survey No. 142/A, admeasuring 4 Acres, 25 Guntas, situated at Ramapur Village, Nalgonda Mandal, Nalgonda District, which was acquired through a registered Sale Deed No. 2345/2002 of S.R.O. Nalgonda, vide Pattadar Pass Book No. 5412, Title Deed No. 8791 issued by Tahsildar, Nalgonda. Whereas the Lessee has approached the Lessor and offered to take on lease the scheduled property belonging to the Lessor and the Lessor has agreed to lease the same on the terms and conditions mentioned hereunder. NOW THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSETH AS UNDER: The lease shall be for a period of 3 (Three) years commencing from 1st November, 2025 and ending on 31st October, 2028. The Lessee shall pay a monthly rent of Rs. 20,000/- (Rupees Twenty Thousand only) exclusive of any water, power or tax charges to the Lessor on or before 5th day of every English calendar month without any default. The payment of monthly rent shall be acknowledged by a duly signed receipt issued by the Lessor. The Lessee has paid Rs. 60,000/- (Rupees Sixty Thousand only) equivalent to 3 months rent as refundable security deposit to the Lessor, which shall be returned at the time of termination of the lease after adjusting dues, if any. The Lessee shall pay, apart from the rent, all water charges and any other levies imposed by the government or local authority. The property tax to local body shall be paid by the Lessor only. The Lessee shall not sublet, assign, or transfer the leasehold rights or part with possession of the land to any person without written consent of the Lessor. The Lessee shall cultivate the land properly, keep the property in good condition, and shall not alter, damage, or misuse it for non-agricultural purposes. The Lessee shall not store hazardous materials, explosives, or conduct illegal activities in the scheduled property. The Lessor or his authorized representatives shall be entitled to inspect the land at all reasonable times. In the event of breach of any terms by the Lessee, the Lessor shall be entitled to terminate this lease without notice and take possession of the land. The Lessee shall pay rent regularly every month before the 5th of each month and obtain a receipt for the same. The Lessor declares that the scheduled land is not assigned land within the meaning of the Andhra Pradesh Assigned Lands (Prohibition of Transfers) Act, 9 of 1977, and does not belong to or is under mortgage to any government agency. The Lessor further declares that the land is not affected by the provisions of the Telangana Land Reforms (Ceiling on Agricultural Holdings) Act, 1973. The Lessor declares that there are no mango, coconut, or orange groves, no fish ponds, and no quarries or machinery existing on the said land. If any suppression of facts is found later, the Lessor shall be liable for prosecution under law and payment of deficit duty. SCHEDULE OF PROPERTY All that piece and parcel of Agricultural Land bearing Survey No. 142/A, admeasuring Ac. 4.25 Gts., situated in Ramapur Village, Nalgonda Mandal, Nalgonda District, under the jurisdiction of Sub-Registrar, Nalgonda, bounded by: North: Land of Sri Prakash Reddy South: Land of Sri Mallesh Goud East: Village Canal West: Land of Sri Mahesh Reddy Market Value of the land: Rs. 12,00,000/- (Rupees Twelve Lakhs only) IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Lessor and the Lessee have signed this Lease Agreement in token of their acceptance with free will and without any coercion in the presence of the witnesses. WITNESSES: Mr. Venu Gopal, S/o S. Narayana, R/o 3-17, Ramapur Village, Nalgonda. Mrs. Anitha Devi, W/o Suresh Reddy, R/o 2-11, Lakshmipur Village, Nalgonda. LESSOR: Sd/- RAMESH REDDY LESSEE: Sd/- NAGARAJU YADAV
summary: This document is a Lease Agreement for agricultural land executed on October 28, 2025, in Nalgonda District, Telangana. Parties and Property Details LESSOR (Landlord): Sri Ramesh Reddy (Owner of the land). LESSEE (Tenant): Sri Nagaraju Yadav (Taking the land for cultivation). Property Leased: Agricultural land bearing Survey No. 142/A, admeasuring 4 Acres, 25 Guntas, situated at Ramapur Village, Nalgonda Mandal, Nalgonda District. Purpose: The Lessee is taking the land for cultivation/agriculture. Lease Duration and Financials Lease Period: 3 (Three) years. Start Date: November 1, 2025. End Date: October 31, 2028. Monthly Rent: ?20,000/- (Rupees Twenty Thousand only). Payment Due Date: On or before the 5th day of every month. Security Deposit: ?60,000/- (Rupees Sixty Thousand only), equivalent to 3 months' rent. Refund: The deposit is refundable upon termination, after adjusting any outstanding dues. Responsibilities for Charges Paid by Lessor (Landlord): Property tax to the local body. Paid by Lessee (Tenant): All water charges and any other levies imposed by the government or local authority (in addition to the rent). Covenants and Conditions Use and Condition: The Lessee must: Cultivate the land properly and keep it in good condition. Not alter, damage, or misuse the land for non-agricultural purposes. Not store hazardous materials, explosives, or conduct illegal activities. Transfer Restrictions: The Lessee shall not sublet, assign, or transfer the leasehold rights or possession to any person without the written consent of the Lessor. Inspection Right: The Lessor is entitled to inspect the land at all reasonable times. Breach and Termination: In case the Lessee breaches any terms, the Lessor can terminate the lease without notice and immediately take possession of the land. Lessor's Declarations on Title The Lessor formally declares that the scheduled land: Is not "assigned land" under the relevant A.P. and Telangana Acts (prohibiting transfer). Is not affected by the Telangana Land Reforms (Ceiling on Agricultural Holdings) Act, 1973. Is free from any mortgages to a government agency. Does not contain high-value assets like mango groves, fish ponds, or quarries. The Lessor is liable for prosecution and payment of deficit duty if any suppression of facts is later found.

text: PARTITION DEED This Partition is made the 12th day of March 2024 Between Mr. Ramesh Krishnan, S/o Late Krishnan Iyer, aged about 60 years, residing at No. 14, Lakshmi Nagar, Mylapore, Chennai – 600004, of the First Part, Mr. Suresh Krishnan, S/o Late Krishnan Iyer, aged about 56 years, residing at No. 22, R.K. Salai, Mylapore, Chennai – 600004, of the Second Part, and Mrs. Anitha Srinivasan, D/o Late Krishnan Iyer, aged about 50 years, residing at Flat No. 8B, Green Gardens Apartments, T. Nagar, Chennai – 600017, of the Third Part. Whereas Ramesh Krishnan is entitled to an undivided half share, and Suresh Krishnan and Anitha Srinivasan are each entitled to an undivided one-fourth share in the properties described in the First, Second and Third Schedules hereto (hereinafter referred to as the said properties), and whereas the parties desire to divide and partition the said properties for convenient and separate enjoyment, the parties have agreed as follows: NOW THIS DEED WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS: That in pursuance of the said agreement and in consideration of mutual transfers and releases, Suresh Krishnan and Anitha Srinivasan do hereby grant, convey, transfer, and release unto Ramesh Krishnan all that property described in the First Schedule, together with all rights, easements, appurtenances thereto, to constitute him the sole and absolute owner thereof, free from all claims of the other parties, to have and to hold the same absolutely and forever. That in pursuance of the said agreement, Ramesh Krishnan and Anitha Srinivasan do hereby grant, convey, transfer, and release unto Suresh Krishnan all that property described in the Second Schedule, together with all rights, drains, and easements thereto, to constitute him the sole and absolute owner thereof, free from all claims of the other parties, to have and to hold the same absolutely and forever. That in pursuance of the said agreement, Ramesh Krishnan and Suresh Krishnan do hereby grant, convey, transfer, and release unto Anitha Srinivasan all that property described in the Third Schedule, together with all rights and appurtenances thereto, to constitute her the sole and absolute owner thereof, free from all claims of the other parties, to have and to hold the same absolutely and forever. AND THIS INDENTURE FURTHER WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS: (a) That Ramesh Krishnan shall have custody and possession of all original title deeds and this deed and shall produce them whenever required by either of the other parties at their cost. (b) That except for the charge hereby created, the properties described in the schedules are free from all encumbrances. (c) That no party shall have any easement or quasi-easement over the allotments made to the others. (d) That each party shall enter upon their respective allotments and enjoy them peacefully and absolutely without interference from others. (e) That each party shall, at the request and cost of the other, execute or perform such further deeds or acts as may be required to perfect the title to their respective allotments. (f) That none of the parties shall sell or transfer their property to a stranger without first offering it to the other parties at the prevailing market value. (g) That this partition shall not be reopened on any ground whatsoever, but further deeds may be executed to rectify any clerical or technical errors if necessary. IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereunto have set and subscribed their respective hands on the day, month, and year first above written. Signed, sealed and delivered: (Sd/-) Ramesh Krishnan (Sd/-) Suresh Krishnan (Sd/-) Anitha Srinivasan WITNESSES: Mr. Rajesh Kumar, Advocate, Chennai. Mrs. Latha Nair, Residing at Alwarpet, Chennai. FIRST SCHEDULE (Property allotted to Ramesh Krishnan) All that piece and parcel of residential property bearing Door No. 14, Lakshmi Nagar, Mylapore, Chennai – 600004, measuring 2,400 sq.ft, together with the existing house and appurtenances thereto, bounded: North by – 5th Cross Street South by – Neighbor’s Property East by – Road West by – Vacant Land SECOND SCHEDULE (Property allotted to Suresh Krishnan) All that piece and parcel of land and building bearing Door No. 22, R.K. Salai, Mylapore, Chennai – 600004, measuring 1,800 sq.ft, bounded: North by – Vacant Site South by – House of Mr. Rajagopal East by – R.K. Salai Road West by – House of Mr. Raghavan THIRD SCHEDULE (Property allotted to Anitha Srinivasan) All that piece and parcel of residential flat Flat No. 8B, Green Gardens Apartments, T. Nagar, Chennai – 600017, super built-up area 1,200 sq.ft, together with one car parking space and undivided share of land measuring 400 sq.ft, bounded: North by – Building Corridor South by – Open Space East by – Lift Lobby West by – Balcony
summary: This document is a Partition Deed created on March 12, 2024, among three siblings: Mr. Ramesh Krishnan, Mr. Suresh Krishnan, and Mrs. Anitha Srinivasan, to formally divide properties inherited from their father, Late Krishnan Iyer.Initial Ownership and PurposeBefore this deed, the siblings held undivided shares in the properties:Ramesh Krishnan was entitled to half (1/2) of the total property.Suresh Krishnan was entitled to one-fourth (1/4) of the total property.Anitha Srinivasan was entitled to one-fourth (1/4) of the total property.The purpose of this Deed is to partition the properties for the convenient and separate enjoyment of each sibling. In exchange for the final property, each sibling transfers and releases their previous share, making the new owner the sole and absolute owner, free from any claims by the others.Final Property AllotmentsRamesh Krishnan is allotted the residential property at No. 14, Lakshmi Nagar, Mylapore (First Schedule).Suresh Krishnan is allotted the land and building at No. 22, R.K. Salai, Mylapore (Second Schedule).Anitha Srinivasan is allotted Flat No. 8B, Green Gardens Apartments, T. Nagar (Third Schedule), including one car parking space and the undivided share of land.Key Terms and ConditionsCustody of Deeds: Mr. Ramesh Krishnan will keep the original title deeds and this Partition Deed, but he must produce them when required by the others at the requester's cost.No Encumbrances: All properties are confirmed to be free from all charges and claims, except for the transfers established by this deed.No Shared Rights: No sibling is granted any easement or quasi-easement (shared rights or use) over the property allotted to another.Peaceful Enjoyment: Each party is entitled to enter and enjoy their newly allotted property peacefully without interference.Right of First Refusal: If any party wishes to sell their property to a stranger, they must first offer it to the other parties at the prevailing market value.Finality: This partition is considered final and cannot be reopened on any grounds.

text: INDIA NON JUDICIAL TELANGANA STATE E-Stamp Certificate No.: TG-HYD-2022-985647123 E-Stamp Date: 12/09/2022 Value of Stamp Duty Paid: ?2,70,000/- (Rupees Two Lakhs Seventy Thousand Only) Registration Fee Paid: ?45,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Thousand Only) Market Value of Property: 45,00,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Lakhs Only) This SALE DEED is made and executed on this the 15th day of September, 2022, at the office of Sub-Registrar, Uppal, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, Telangana State. By: The Telangana Rajiv Swagruha Corporation Ltd., a company registered under Indian Company Act, its Office situated at premises H.No.3-6-184, First Floor, TSHCL building, Urdu Gally, Himayath Nagar, Hyderabad-500029, duly represented by Naib Tahsildar, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, Telangana viz Sri. K. Ramesh, S/o K. Venkataiah, aged about 46 years, R/o H.No. 8-12, Sri Nagar Colony, Uppal, Hyderabad - 500039. AADHAAR NO. 4568 2390 7711 MOBILE NO. 9849023456 (In terms of powers conferred upon him by the District Collector, Medchal-Malkajgiri District vide Proc No. E2/695/2022, Dt. 19.07.2022 read with the power and authority conferred by the Housing (VC) Department, Government of Telangana, vide Letter No. 111/VC.A2/2022-2, Dt. 19.02.2022.) Hereinafter referred to as the “VENDOR” which term shall mean and include its officers-in-succession, officers, and its representatives etc. IN FAVOUR OF Sri Arvind Reddy, S/o G. Mahender Reddy, aged about 38 years, Occupation: Software Engineer, R/o H.No. 5-7-11, Green Valley Enclave, Nacharam, Hyderabad - 500076. Aadhaar No. 5222 6699 8833 Mobile No. 9000011122 Hereinafter referred to as the “VENDEE” which term shall mean and include his successors-in-interest, legal heirs, and legal representatives etc. WHEREAS the VENDOR is the Corporation of Government of Telangana, incorporated under Indian Companies Act, for the purpose of providing houses/flats to various sections of society and in pursuance of its aims and objects, the then Government of Andhra Pradesh has alienated land admeasuring Ac.29-14 Guntas in Sy.No.42 situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri in favour of the VENDOR / The Telangana Rajiv Swagruha Corporation Limited, Hyderabad, vide G.O.Ms.No.1514 Revenue (ASN.V) Department, Dt:16.12.2008 and advance possession was delivered by the Revenue Authorities of the then Ranga Reddy District on 21.09.2007 under cover of Panchanama to the VENDOR. The VENDOR grounded a housing project and constructed residential apartments/flats in the name and style of “Sahabhavana Township” under the Rajiv Swagruha Scheme. WHEREAS the VENDOR intending to sell the Flats covered under the name and style of “Sahabhavana Township” situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, under Rajiv Swagruha Scheme in favour of prospective purchasers. WHEREAS during the lottery conducted by the Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority (HMDA) on 28-06-2022 and 29-06-2022, the VENDEE herein emerged as the successful applicant for allotment of Flat No. 205, admeasuring 1,215 Sq.ft, 2 BHK, on Floor No. 2, Tower No. 3, in the name and style of “Sahabhavana Township” situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, Telangana, for a total sale consideration of Rs. 45,00,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Lakhs only). WHEREAS the confirmation letter issued by the VENDOR, through Lr. No. TRSCL/SAHA/CONF/205/2022, dt. 05.07.2022 to the VENDEE. WHEREAS the Flat No. 205, Admeasuring 1,215 Sq.ft, consisting of 2 Bed Rooms, on Floor No. 2, Block No. B, Tower No. 3, with fixtures and fittings in the name and style of “Sahabhavana Township” situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri together with undivided share of land admeasuring 45 Sq. Yds out of land admeasuring 3,500 Sq.Yds together with Car Parking Slot No. 18, is allotted to VENDEE herein after referred to as the “Schedule of Property.” Whereas the VENDEE herein has paid the total sale consideration of Rs. 45,00,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Lakhs only) through HMDA to the Government of Telangana treasury through: i. Transaction ID HMDA20220915A Dt.15.09.2022 Amount Rs. 15,00,000/- ii. Transaction ID HMDA20220915B Dt.15.09.2022 Amount Rs. 15,00,000/- iii. Transaction ID HMDA20220915C Dt.15.09.2022 Amount Rs. 15,00,000/- The VENDOR do hereby admit and acknowledge the receipt of said total sale consideration from VENDEE through HMDA. NOW THEREFORE THIS SALE DEED WITNESSETH AS FOLLOWS: That the VENDOR shall sell and VENDEE shall purchase the Schedule of Property bearing Flat No. 205, Admeasuring 1,215 Sft, on the 2nd Floor, Tower/Block No. 3, under name and style “Sahabhavana Township” situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, for a total sale consideration of Rs. 45,00,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Lakhs only). The VENDOR do hereby admit and acknowledge the receipt of above total sale from the VENDEE through HMDA. The VENDOR do hereby convey, transfer and sell the “Schedule of Property” with all rights, title, ownership, possession, and interest unto the VENDEE absolutely and forever. That the VENDOR has this day delivered the actual physical possession of the Schedule Property to the VENDEE and put the VENDEE into actual physical possession of the same, and henceforth the VENDEE shall be entitled to enjoy the title, ownership, and possession of the property as full and absolute owner. The VENDEE shall have all rights of easements in enjoyment of the Schedule Property without any interruption. That the VENDOR do hereby undertake to do all acts required for mutation in favour of the VENDEE and to execute all lawful deeds for perfecting the conveyance. That the VENDOR has assured the VENDEE that VENDOR is entitled to sell the Schedule Property and there is no legal impediment to the sale. The VENDOR declares that the property is free from all encumbrances, charges, or claims whatsoever. The VENDEE shall use the open land, roads, driveways, and all amenities along with other flat owners. The VENDEE and other flat owners shall use the staircase, lift, parking area, and terrace jointly without claiming exclusive rights. The VENDEE shall keep the premises and fittings in good condition and not use it for any purpose other than residential use. In the event of VENDEE being deprived of any part of the property owing to defect in title, the VENDOR shall indemnify the VENDEE. The VENDEE shall pay property taxes and duties hereinafter claimed by any competent authority. SCHEDULE OF PROPERTY Flat No. 205, with a plinth area of 1,215 Sq.Ft., 2 BHK, Tower No. 3, together with car parking slot no. 18, in the name and style of “Sahabhavana Township” situated at Village: Bandlaguda, Mandal: Uppal, District: Medchal-Malkajgiri, Telangana, in Survey No.42 bounded by NORTH : Open Space SOUTH : Flat No. 206 EAST : Corridor WEST : Outer Compound Wall Together with undivided land share measuring 45 Sq.Yds, out of total land of 3,500 Sq.Yds., covered under Tower No. 3 along with the following fittings and fixtures as shown in the annexure. IN WITNESS WHEREOF the VENDOR, the Rajiv Swagruha Corporation Limited represented by its authorized officer, and the VENDEE signed this sale deed on the day and year referred above. VENDOR The Telangana Rajiv Swagruha Corporation Ltd. (Represented by Sri K. Ramesh, Naib Tahsildar) VENDEE Sri Arvind Reddy S/o G. Mahender Reddy Aged about 38 years R/o H.No. 5-7-11, Green Valley Enclave, Nacharam, Hyderabad – 500076 WITNESS: P. Ramesh, H.No. 5-12, Ramanthapur, Hyderabad – 500013. S. Divya, H.No. 9-44, Bandlaguda, Hyderabad – 500068.
summary: This document is a Sale Deed executed on September 15, 2022, in Uppal, Telangana. It formalizes the sale of a government-constructed flat. Parties Involved and Background VENDOR (Seller): The Telangana Rajiv Swagruha Corporation Ltd. (a Telangana Government company), represented by Sri. K. Ramesh (Naib Tahsildar). VENDEE (Buyer): Sri Arvind Reddy (aged 38), a Software Engineer. Background: The VENDOR constructed the residential apartments, named “Sahabhavana Township,” under the Rajiv Swagruha Scheme on land alienated by the Government of Telangana. Property Details and Consideration Property Sold (Schedule of Property): Flat No. 205, a 2 BHK unit with a plinth area of 1,215 Sq.ft, located on the 2nd Floor of Tower No. 3 in Sahabhavana Township, Bandlaguda Village, Uppal Mandal. Property Rights Included: One Car Parking Slot No. 18. An undivided share of land measuring 45 Sq. Yds out of the total land for Tower No. 3. Total Sale Consideration (Price): ?45,00,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Lakhs Only). Acquisition Method: The VENDEE was the successful applicant in a lottery conducted by HMDA in June 2022. Payment: The VENDEE paid the full ?45,00,000/- through three separate transactions via HMDA to the Government Treasury. Transfer of Ownership and Rights Transfer: The VENDOR conveys, transfers, and sells the Schedule of Property with all rights, title, ownership, possession, and interest to the VENDEE absolutely and forever. Possession: The VENDOR has delivered the actual physical possession of the property to the VENDEE on the day of the sale deed execution. Rights of Enjoyment: The VENDEE is entitled to enjoy the property as the full and absolute owner and has all rights of easements (legal rights to use another's land for a specific purpose, like access). VENDOR's Assurances and Declarations The VENDOR assures the VENDEE that: The VENDOR is fully entitled to sell the property, and there is no legal impediment to the sale. The property is free from all encumbrances, charges, or claims whatsoever. The VENDOR will undertake all necessary acts, including mutation (updating revenue records), to perfect the conveyance in favor of the VENDEE. The VENDOR shall indemnify the VENDEE if the VENDEE is deprived of the property due to a defect in the VENDOR's title. VENDEE's Responsibilities and Shared Use The VENDEE agrees to: Pay property taxes and other duties claimed by competent authorities. Keep the premises and fittings in good condition. Use the property only for residential use. Jointly use common areas like open land, roads, driveways, staircase, lift, parking area, and terrace along with other flat owners, without claiming exclusive rights to these common areas.

text: GOVERNMENT OF MAHARASHTRA e-STAMP Certificate No.: IN-MH-12345678901234 Stamp Duty Paid: Rs. 1000 Date of Purchase: 20/09/2024 Description of Document: LEAVE AND LICENSE AGREEMENT Property Details: Flat No. 12B, Ocean View Apartments, Juhu First Party: Mr. Deepak Kulkarni Second Party: Mr. Sameer Khan (This header text is typically the output of the OCR/PDF-to-text conversion of the top section of the e-Stamp Paper) LEAVE AND LICENSE AGREEMENT THIS AGREEMENT is made and entered into at Mumbai this 20th day of September, 2024. BETWEEN Mr. Deepak Kulkarni S/o Mr. Madhav Kulkarni, residing at 501, Heritage Building, Vile Parle, Mumbai 400049, hereinafter referred to as the “LICENSOR” (which expression shall mean and include his heirs, executors, administrators, and assigns) of the ONE PART; AND Mr. Sameer Khan D/o Mr. Irfan Khan, residing at 18, Azad Nagar, Jogeshwari, Mumbai 400102, hereinafter referred to as the “LICENSEE” (which expression shall mean and include his/her heirs, executors, administrators, and assigns) of the OTHER PART. WHEREAS the Licensor is the sole and absolute owner of the residential flat being Flat No. 12B on the 12th Floor of Ocean View Apartments at Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai 400049 (hereinafter referred to as the "LICENSED PREMISES"). AND WHEREAS the Licensee has requested the Licensor to allow him/her to occupy and use the LICENSED PREMISES on a 'Leave and License' basis for residential purposes. THE PARTIES HEREBY AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING TERMS AND CONDITIONS: LICENSE PERIOD: The License shall be for a period of 11 (Eleven) months commencing from 01st October 2024 and shall end on 31st August 2025. LICENSE FEE: The Licensee shall pay to the Licensor a monthly License Fee of Rs. 45,000/- (Rupees Forty-Five Thousand Only). DEPOSIT: The Licensee shall pay a refundable Security Deposit of Rs. 2,00,000/- (Rupees Two Lakh Only). The Licensor shall refund the deposit within 30 days of the Licensee vacating the premises. GOVERNMENT CHARGES: The property taxes and society charges shall be paid by the Licensor. The electricity and water charges shall be paid by the Licensee. SCHEDULE OF PROPERTY (LICENSED PREMISES): All that piece and parcel of the residential flat bearing Flat No. 12B, 12th Floor, Ocean View Apartments, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra, admeasuring about 110.0 Sq. Mtrs. (Carpet Area). LICENSOR Signature: _________________________ Name: Mr. Deepak Kulkarni LICENSEE Signature: _________________________ Name: Mr. Sameer Khan WITNESSES Sunita Das John D'Souza
summary: This document is a Leave and License Agreement signed on September 20, 2024, between Mr. Deepak Kulkarni (the Licensor/Owner) and Mr. Sameer Khan (the Licensee/Occupant). Property and Term Details Property (Licensed Premises): Flat No. 12B, 12th Floor, Ocean View Apartments, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu, Mumbai (Carpet Area: approximately 110.0 Sq. Mtrs.). Purpose of License: For residential purposes only. License Period: 11 (Eleven) months. Start Date: October 1, 2024. End Date: August 31, 2025.
